property.content:
{{velocity}} #if ($xcontext.action == 'view' && $xwiki.hasAccessLevel('view', $xcontext.user, 'PhenoTips.SimilarCases')) #if (!$services.patientconsents.hasConsent($doc.getName(), "real")) #break #end #set ($suggestionsConfig = $xwiki.getDocument("${doc.space}.SimilarCasesConfiguration").getObject('PhenoTips.SimilarCases')) #if ($suggestionsConfig && "$!{suggestionsConfig.getProperty('enable').value}" == '1') #set ($patient = $services.patients.get($doc.name)) #set ($patientAccess = $services.permissions.getEntityAccess($patient.id)) #if (!($patient.features.isEmpty() && $patient.genes.isEmpty()) && $patientAccess.getVisibility().compareTo($services.permissions.resolveVisibility('matchable')) >= 0) ## Can see similar cases for this patient $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.SimilarCases', {'minify' : false})## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.SimilarCases')## $xwiki.jsx.use($doc.fullName, {'minify' : false})## #set ($max_results = "$!{suggestionsConfig.getProperty('max_results').value}") #set ($min_score = "$!{suggestionsConfig.getProperty('min_score').value}") ## (% class="clear clinical-info similarity-info chapter"%)(((## == $escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('phenotips.similarCases.title')) == {{html clean=false}}
{{/html}}## (% class="similar-cases-category similar-cases-local" %)((( === $escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('phenotips.similarCases.subtitle')) === (% class="similarity-results-container-local" %)((( (% class="similarity-results-container" id="similar-patients-container" %)((()))## ## Pagination $xwiki.ssfx.use('js/xwiki/table/livetable.css', true)## $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/matchingNotification/contactDialog.css')## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/matchingNotification/matcherPaginator.js', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/matchingNotification/matcherPageSizer.js', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/matchingNotification/matcherContactDialog.js', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/matchingNotification/errorDialog.js', true)## {{html clean=false}} $services.localization.render('platform.livetable.paginationPagePrevTitle') $services.localization.render('platform.livetable.paginationPageNextTitle') $services.localization.render('platform.livetable.paginationPage') {{/html}})))## ))) ## Allow to plug in other data sources #foreach ($e in $services.uix.getExtensions("org.phenotips.patientSheet.similarCases")) (% class="similar-cases-category" %)((( {{html clean=false}}$services.rendering.render($e.execute(), 'xhtml/1.0'){{/html}} ))) #end #end## can see similar patients #end## suggestions enabled #end## action == view {{/velocity}}
